title: Summer Monteys-Fullam teases new acting career and TV role
text:

Paul Hollywood 's ex Summer Monteys-Fullam has treated her Instagram followers to a glimpse of her new ventures.

The 24-year-old former girlfriend of Great British Bake Off judge Paul Hollywood, 53, has been teasing subtle hints at her future acting career.

Following the split, Summer has kept herself busy pursuing her dream of becoming a social media influencer.

(Image: Instagram/summermonteysfullam)

The fiery redhead shared a cheeky boomerang GIF with her 15.5 million followers which showed her enjoying a large glass of wine and offering the camera a sultry wink.

She captioned the Instagram story: "Four hours of rehearsals with @N4omiryan.official, NAILED IT."

Naomi most recently played Gwendolyn Hall in the British/American mystery drama TV series, Guilt, on Freeform.

Summer's rehearsals with Naomi have led followers to question whether the former barmaid is set to join Naomi in her next TV role.

(Image: Instagram/summermonteysfullam)

Just last week Summer shared another Instagram snap with a hint towards her acting career. She wrote: On holiday having an amazing tie with my sister, never thought I'd be reading a script in the sun."

This sent her loyal fans wild as they fled to the comment section to speculate Summer's new opportunity.

One excited fan wrote: "Can't wait to see you on TV in your own right."

While another penned: "So excited watching you on your journey. Can't wait to see you on TV, you will ace it!"

Summer thanked fans for their well-wishes and revealed she is excited for her new chapter.

Summer's ex Paul lost two loves of his life in the space of weeks last month as he split with Summer just as his divorce from Alex was finalised.

He was dumped by the barmaid after he asked her to sign an NDA forbidding her to discuss their relationship publicly.

The Bake Off judge still has some of the red-haired beauty's belongings at the £1 million home they once shared, although he is insisting she must pay half for them.

(Image: Getty Images)

Since their highly-publicised split, newly single Summer has vowed to embark on a career in reality television with recent rumours circulating she could appear on this year's I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here .

However Summer recently slammed speculation by saying: "I did state a few weeks ago, that I wasn’t going on I’m a celeb this year, as it was rumoured. However, I’m a free woman, I can do what I want without anyone telling me no."️

The redhead even has an agent after signing herself to agency Broad International following the demise of her two-year romance.

Her split from Paul has turned sour with the baker accusing her of "making money selling stories and continuously courting the paps" on social media.

It's claimed Melissa Spalding, 36, is the Great British Bake Off star's current flame, after they met at her pub in Smarden, Kent, near the home Paul and Summer once shared.
description: Paul Hollywood's former flame is reportedly set to make her TV debut as she teases her followers with rehearsal sneak peeks
